item.title: Android Development最佳实践
item.description: 原文：Android Development | Best Practices 仅仅写代码是不够的，要高效地写代码。 下面是作者总结的Android开发最佳实践。 Tips and not Tricks 1) Choose your App Architecture wisely based on your need, not just
